titles.title: Clinical Social Workers' Recognition Act of 2009
A bill to amend chapter 81 of title 5, United States Code, to authorize the use of clinical social workers to conduct evaluations to determine work-related emotional and mental illnesses.

action.text: Sponsor introductory remarks on measure. (CR S58)
Read twice and referred to the Committee on Homeland Security and Governmental Affairs.

bill.summary:
1/6/2009--Introduced.
Clinical Social Workers' Recognition Act of 2009 - Amends federal law concerning federal workers' compensation to authorize the use of clinical social workers to conduct evaluations to determine work-related emotional and mental illnesses.
